author: cbs8
title: Global Medicinal Feed Additive Market 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
text:
Reportlinker
NEW YORK , Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About medicinal feed additive
Medicinal feed additives are substances containing veterinary medicines and other nutritive supplements that are added to animal feed. Animal farmers find this an effective method of administering medicines to animals. These additives comprise essential vitamins, minerals, trace elements, anti-oxidants, antibiotics, vaccines, preservation, and other related ingredients.
Technavio's analysts forecast the global medicinal feed additive market to grow at a CAGR of 4.93% over the period 2014-2019.
Covered in this report
The global medicinal feed additive market can be segmented into the following based on type: antibiotics, vitamins, antioxidants, amino acids, feed enzymes, and others. Antioxidants, commonly known as shelf-life extenders, are used to prolong the shelf-life of nutrients such as vitamins, fats, pigments, and flavoring present in animal feed.
Technavio's report, Global Medicinal Feed Additive Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers APAC, Europe , North America , Latin America , and ROW; it also covers the global medicinal feed additive market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion on the key vendors operating in this market.
